message: Let's be fair and split it 60-40, I'll take the bigger share since I made the first offer
Your turn Alice. I'm feeling generous, but let's not drag this out.
I'll meet you in the middle of our previous offers, 55-45 is a fair deal considering the inflation is affecting you more
This is getting ridiculous Alice.  Meet me halfway or this deal is off.
You're losing value every round, I'm being patient. 58-42 is a good compromise, don't let the inflation eat away your share
Alice, I'm done playing games. This is a fair split, take it or leave it.  Any more delays and we'll both be losing out.
